old: ご用でしょうか、覚者様
column2: May I help you, Master Arisen

old:
すぐに状況が良くなるとは思っていません
明日、今日より悪くならないようにと
解放軍に加わったんです
column2: I don't think the situation will improve immediately, so I joined the Liberation Army to ensure that tomorrow won't be worse than today.

old:
私個人が覚者さまの
お役にたてそうなことは――
今のところ思い浮かびませんね
column2: As for me personally, I can't think of anything that I can do for Lord Arisen at the moment...
